nodes.text: Star Wars: Rebel Agent was a canceled video game that was planned by LucasArts. The game was to focus on Rebel agent.
According to some sources, the game's plot was to focus on an unnamed Rebel agent that would have tried to help the Alliance to Restore the Republic to defeat the Galactic Empire.

At a one unspecified point, LucasArts tried to develop Star Wars: Rebel Agent as part of its planned Star Wars: Rebel video game series, which also included other titles like Star Wars: Rebel Fury, Star Wars: Rebel Warrior, Star Wars: Rebel Scum and Star Wars: Rebel Jedi.
Despite this, the game was finally cancelled due unknown reasons, along the whole Star Wars: Rebel video game series.
